short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to view the sitemap of any website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension XML Sitemap allows you to easily view the sitemap of any website you visit. Simply click the extension icon, and it will attempt to fetch and display the sitemap from the current website's domain. This tool is particularly useful for web developers, SEO specialists, and anyone interested in exploring the structure of a website.
Key Features:
Automatic Sitemap Detection: The extension checks for the presence of a sitemap at the standard location (/sitemap.xml) for the current website.
User-Friendly Interface: The sitemap is displayed in a clean and readable format, making it easy to navigate and find specific URLs.
Cross-Domain Compatibility: Works with most websites, regardless of their domain or protocol.
How to Use:
Install the Extension: Add the Sitemap Viewer to your Chrome browser.
Visit a Website: Go to any website you want to explore.
Click the Extension Icon: Click the Sitemap Viewer icon in your toolbar to view the sitemap.
This extension simplifies the process of accessing and viewing sitemaps, making it a valuable tool for anyone working with websites.
